com.oose2015.group11.resistance

Class Missionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2015.group11.resistance.Missionary

  • public class Missionary
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is responsible for giving Missionaries (Missionaries are Players with additional functionality, but are constantly changing) the ability to vote on Missions. Can change the Missionary to another Player easily.
    Author:
    Group 11
